# t-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                   | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ----------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (optional) Devider class      | `string`  | `''`    |
| `horizontal`  | `horizontal`   | (optional) Devider horizontal | `boolean` | `true`  |
| `size`        | `size`         | (optional) Devider size       | `string`  | `''`    |
| `theme`       | `theme`        | (optional) Devider theme      | `string`  | `''`    |
| `vertical`    | `vertical`     | (optional) Devider vertical   | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                       | Description                                   |
| ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------- |
| `--divider-height`                         | Height of the divider                         |
| `--divider-horizontal-border-bottom`       | Border bottom of the horizontal divider       |
| `--divider-horizontal-border-color`        | Border color of the horizontal divider        |
| `--divider-horizontal-margin-inline-start` | Margin inline start of the horizontal divider |
| `--divider-horizontal-width`               | Width of the horizontal divider               |
| `--divider-margin`                         | Margin of the divider                         |
| `--divider-padding`                        | Padding of the divider                        |
| `--divider-vertical-border-bottom`         | Border bottom of the vertical divider         |
| `--divider-vertical-border-color`          | Border color of the vertical divider          |
| `--divider-vertical-border-left`           | Border left of the vertical divider           |
